content: {"name": "Meal & Pantry \u2013 Hoge Memorial Presbyterian Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Hours: 12-1PM curbside pantry (last 2 Tuesday and last 2 Wednesdays , 50 clients served each day - Zip codes served: 43204, 43223, 43228; Call 614-276-5433 with questions)", "email": "", "url": "hogemempresby.org/food-pantry-at-hoge", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2930 West Broad Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hilltop", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43204", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9552513, "longitude": -83.07867879999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 276-5433", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "04:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}]}
